title: TB ver 115.2.2 Issue
content: 'Recently updated to TB Ver 115.2.2 and certain older emails won't open(13:20-15:04)? Newer email do open(16:09)...? Total of 7 emails can't be viewed...? Peculiar that the attached screenshot shows 15:04 email time stamp, but the header shows 09:06?
creator: brawlman1

title: Donations and Contact
content:
Hi

Why does Thunderbird want all my personal information.......??

I'd be MORE THAN happy to make a donation to support you guys, but I am NOT happy about all the info I have to provide - and frankly I'm bot going to be bullied into giving info I don't want to. I donate to Wikipedia and they don't ask such intrusive questions - so why do you? You say that less than 2% of TB users donate - this PROBABLY the reason why they don't...!

And the fact that there is no direct link to ask somebody ask question about this subject, is really frustrating.

Thanks
creator: minkwa1

title: Cannot reply to verizon.net users
content:
I do NOT use Verizon.net, Outlook.com only.

Prior to your recent release 115.2.2 (64-bit). I could receive and reply, or simply create and send a message to my brother. I can no longer do either. It's amazing how many search engine ASS U ME that I am a verizon.net user.

There is a big window that pops up with a lot of information and quickly disappears. I cannot seem to get a screen capture of it. There was a message much later about SMTP could not verify my password. I know the message to be BS because I have already sent 3 messages today, two of which were replies.

Hopefully you can tell me what has happened.

Thank you, Steve
creator: sdelory
